name: Bowdoindining-chrome
tagline: A Chrome Extension for Bowdoin Students to access their dining hall menus.
body:
### Bowdoin Dining for Chrome
This Google Chrome extension provides access to Bowdoin College's Dining Hall menus. It uses a combination of Javascript and PHP to scrape menu information from Bowdoin Dining's own website, format it, and present it in a nice wrapper for Google Chrome.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
